name: Dungeons and Flagons
description:
This game was created for the 2018 OLC Code Jam Challenge: https://itch.io/jam/olc-codejam-2018

As far as I'm aware, this only works on Windows, and the game is 64bit.

This is my attempt at a simple top-down 2D game. The main mechanic here is the player's lightsource, which diminishes over time. You need to collect torches to keep the flame alive, while dodging the many ghosts. In addition, you need to "discover" the dungeon exit to escape this pitiful world you've found yourself in.

One can only hope that the exit is only lightly guarded...

Hope you enjoy - leave any comments on your thoughts please!

This was made using the Chili Framework: http://wiki.planetchili.net/index.php... - thanks Chili!

Thanks to Eric Skiff (http://ericskiff.com/music) for his amazing music! Using the tracks "Come and Find Me - B mix", "Come and Find Me", "Ascending", and "Digital Native".
